General.Name: Asuransi Bina Dana Arta Tbk
General.Description: PT Asuransi Bina Dana Arta Tbk operates as a general insurance company in Indonesia. The company offers motor vehicles, fire, personal accident and health, transportation, liability, engineering, marine cargo, heavy equipment, home, property, travel, and other insurance products. It also engages in the motor vehicle workshop and repair business. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Asuransi Bina Dana Arta Tbk operates as a subsidiary of Oona Insurance Pte. Ltd.
